title: No popup menu on Java editor ruler in Photon
description: When using Photon, there is no popup menu when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor. This menu should allow the user to add breakpoints or marks, but it is not appearing.
OB:
1) Open a Java editor. 
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. 

The expected behavior is that a popup menu should appear, providing options to add breakpoints or marks.
EB:
1) Open a Java editor. 
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. 

The observed behavior is that no popup menu appears, preventing the user from adding breakpoints or marks as expected.
SR:
1) Open the Eclipse Photon IDE. 
2) Open a Java editor. 
3) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. 

The popup menu to add breakpoints or marks should appear as expected.
